overview:
Jack Spilberg is Meebo’s Director of Marketing Solutions and oversees the development, implementation, and evaluation of revenue-generating programs for Meebo. In this role, Jack drives customer/clients needs into new features, new services, and new programs, balancing the needs of Meebo’s revenue goals with the need to maintain product integrity and user interests.

Jack got his start in media at TransWorld Media (a former subsidiary of Time Warner) and Fox Interactive Media where he interfaced with ad clients creating sales programs, innovative sponsorships, events and promotions.

Prior to joining Meebo Jack was on staff at Pandora Media, Inc. where he focused on brand marketing, collaborating with various teams and developing programs with major brands like McDonalds, Jack Daniels, Verizon Wireless, and more.
